page.title: 04Shopping Survey P.1.
page.content: At the Northern edge of our block is the Asda superstore.It lies about 2 miles outside Merthyr town centre near the head of the valleys road.As out of town shopping is new to the area we decided to carry out a survey to try and answer 3 questions. Q1.How far people travelled to the store? Q2.How often did they shop there? Q3.Which of these reasons tells why they use the store? a)Better quality food. b)Cheaper prices. c)Free bus service. d)Cheap petrol. e)Late opening (open until 8pm.). f)All round shopping in one store. We made a questionnaire and asked a 100 shoppers to fill it in. The result to Q1. was that 58% of shoppers lived 3 to 5 miles away.
